name: GD AutoBot Trainer
description: Speedhack training bot that learns by mutating inputs and replays the best path at normal speed

train-timescale.name: Train Speed (timescale)
train-timescale.description: Higher = faster attempts, but may reduce determinism

restart-delay-frames.name: Restart Delay (frames)
restart-delay-frames.description: Frames to wait after death before resetting

max-frames.name: Max Frames Per Attempt
max-frames.description: Stops runaway attempts; larger for long levels

mutation-window.name: Mutation Window (frames)
mutation-window.description: Mutations concentrate around death frame Â± window

mutation-rate.name: Mutation Rate
mutation-rate.description: Probability of flipping a frame input inside the mutation window

seed-tap-rate.name: Seed Tap Density
seed-tap-rate.description: How often random taps are inserted in a new genome (lower = fewer taps)

tap-length-frames.name: Tap Length (frames)
tap-length-frames.description: How long each inserted tap holds

log-status.name: Log Status
log-status.description: Print periodic training status to console
